TopicTitle: High altitude rocket launched from an aircraft into LKO

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, thought i might share my first kerbal video here.

i was trying to figure out a cost effective way of getting large amounts of fuel into orbit and here's my solution at 10,000 credits per run to get 6,000 units of fuel into low orbit. The aircraft and the rocket are both reusable but i haven't included the rocket re-entry, maybe in the next video where i put the fuel to use

https://youtu.be/3L9bDFpeiU4.
